<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Harbormaster](/NPCs.aspx?ID=919)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

There are three flows important to any port: the seaward and coastal flows, marked by the rise and fall of the tides, and the flow of trade. A harbormaster is expected to know the former two reflexively and encourage the latter while knowing jurisdictional rules of law. Often old hands of the sea, harbormasters find themselves anchored to a port by commitment, conflict, or reputation.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Magistrate_Harbormaster.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Harbormaster](/NPCs.aspx?ID=919)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 225</row>

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +5, [Fishing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +5, [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** +2

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Steady Balance** Whenever the harbormaster rolls a success on a check to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28), they get a critical success instead. They're not [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) while Balancing on narrow surfaces and uneven ground. They can attempt an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check instead of a Reflex save to [Grab an Edge](/Actions.aspx?ID=95).

**Items**
[Fishing Tackle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=20), [Hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27) (2), ledger, [Manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), [Spyglass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=54)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 46

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hatchet +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hatchet +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 slashing

**Experienced Hand**   The harbormaster has endured their share of adverse conditions at sea. Any creature that's in adverse weather or aboard a vessel on rough water is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to the harbormaster.

</column>
